mapper.select: SELECT study_schedule_id, round_num, study_date, start_time, end_time, description, created_at, updated_at, room_id FROM study_schedule WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND study_date >= #{start} AND study_date <= DATE_SUB(#{endExclusive}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY study_date ASC, round_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_schedule (room_id, round_num, study_date, start_time, end_time, description ) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{roundNum}, #{studyDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{description} )
